entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as having earned fifty points for Gryffindor in the House Cup. He is also referred to by Percy as 'Ron's friend'.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as talking to Harry and expressing concern about Ron being in a girls' toilet again.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned by Percy as 'Harry's friend' and is also referred to by Harry when he goes to look for him in the bathroom.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned by Percy as being with Ron and is also referred to by Harry when he goes to look for them in the bathroom.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as having taken the lead in the House Cup.

entities.name: moaning myrtle’s bathroom
entities.description: Moaning Myrtle's bathroom is where Harry goes to look for Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is mentioned as someone who might be around and catch Ron and Hermione in the bathroom.

relationships.description: Harry earned fifty points for Gryffindor in the House Cup.
Percy is concerned about Ron being in a girls' toilet again.
Harry went to Moaning Myrtle's bathroom to look for Ron and Hermione.
Ron is with Hermione in the bathroom.
